chapter.title: Shared File Systems API v1 (SUPPORTED)
chapter.para: Provides coordinated access to shared or distributed file systems.
The Shared File Systems API v1 is functionally identical to the the Shared File Systems API v2. Subsequent API v2 micro-versions, such as v2.1, differ from API v1.
(Since API v2.0) The API uses Compute-style micro-versions.
